attributes.action: Banning of roll-over adverts on the internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Considering the request in the petition, i know this is something that could not be easily achived by the british government alone, although the banning from british websites eg, .co.uk
websites would be very appropriate.
i would expect a lot of people to sign this considering that these roll-over on screen adverts are actually "THE DEVIL"
